    run_or_stf_path: "20210825_134951_Q8027"

    start_offset: 100

      module: SPIN_PUBLISHER_MODULE

    vehicle_control_module {
      module: VEHICLE_CONTROL_MODULE
      playback_source_id: 0
    }

      module: GNSS_IMU_DRIVER_MODULE

      module: IMAGE_PUBLISHER_MODULE
      playback_source_id: 0
    }

      module: SIMULATION_VEHICLE_MODULE
      enable: true
      module_conf {
        [qcraft.SimVehicleConf.sim_vehicle_conf] { engage_start_time: 10000000 }
